Text:
Video is excellent (also, almost no non-English captions, so the fact that it's not from an English source makes no difference).
Audio is...well, not BR quality, but it's in sync, and not muffled. I'd give it 7/10.
When characters are whispering, or when loud enough music and not loud enough speech appear at the same time, it might be a bit difficult to understand what is being said.
